name: WhyWorry Adult Diapers with Tabs, Disposable Incontinence Briefs for Women & Men with Maximum Absorbency, Adult Briefs for Incontinence Overnight, Odor Control, Unisex, Medium, 15 Count
short_description: MAXIMUM ABSORBENCY: WhyWorry adult diapers with tabs, featuring a unique dual core design, are engineered for maximum absorbency, providing up to 12 hours of dryness and overnight protection, making them perfect for those experiencing heavy incontinence.

ODOR CONTROL: With the help of our advanced odor control technology, Why Worry adult incontinence briefs help neutralize odors instantly, allowing our diaper users to feel fresh and confident throughout their day-to-day activities.

FIT ALL CURVES: WhyWorry incontinence diapers with flexible fit features, are crafted from extra-soft materials that are gentle on your skin. They adapt seamlessly to a variety of body shapes and sizes, minimizing irritation during wear.

EXTRA-WIDE TABS: Why Worry unisex adult diapers for men and women feature extra-wide and refastenable tabs for secure, easy changes and adjustments, reducing the risk of slipping. These diapers also have an wetness indicator to signal the need for a change.
LEAK BARRIER GUARDS: Designed with advanced leak barrier guards, WhyWorry adult diapers provide maximum protection, helping you stay dry and confident in any situation.

✔ LEAKAGE BARRIER CUFF KEEPS YOU DRY – LivDry women incontinence underwear feature a comfortable elastic leak-barrier leg cuff with gathered bands. See sizing chart for waist, and the leg cuffs help reduce leaks while sleeping or moving.

✔ SUPER ABSORBENT DIAPERS - LivDry ultimate women adult diapers are so absorbent you may not need bed pads. The proprietary super absorbent gel core holds more fluid to help reduce frequency of changes, for fewer diapers used daily or nightly.

✔ EXTRA SOFT MATERIAL FOR YOUR COMFORT – Designed for feminine skin, LivDry's women diapers feature a soft, cloth-like, latex-free material with stretch panels that contour to your body for a comfortable fit. Plus, tear-away sides allow for easy removal.
